name: Lodventure
description:
Embark on a 1-4 Players Co-op survival adventure in search of a myth called the Lod Stone. Discover resources and build your house. Fight the keepers of the regions with the most suitable equipment for you and move on to the next region to become stronger. With the help of your special skills that you have discovered only just now, show your presence in this search for the mysterious Lod Stone.

ROADMAP




Key Features


  • 1-4 Co-op
    Embark on this search for the mythic Lod stone alone or with your fellow treasure hunters.


  • Base
    Build your own house and craft your items.


  • Dungeons
    Go into dungeon expeditions for better equipments and materials.


  • Keepers
    Slay the keepers of the region to move on to the next region and uncover the mysteries of the Lod stone.
